elementSpec.desc: contains the name of an attribute appearing within running text.
包含在連續文字中出現的屬性名稱。

attDef.desc: supplies an identifier for the scheme in which this name is defined.
提供定義該名稱的基模的識別符碼。

valItem.gloss: this attribute is part of the TEI scheme.
此屬性為TEI基模的一部份。
this attribute is part of the Docbook scheme.
此屬性為Docbook 基模的一部份。
this attribute is part of an unknown scheme.
此屬性所屬基模不明。

elementSpec.desc: contains literal code from some formal language such as a programming language
包含一個正式語言的字母代碼，像是一個程式語言。

attDef.desc: a name identifying the formal language in which the code is expressed
表示該代碼的正式語言名稱

elementSpec.desc: contains any kind of illustrative example.
包含任何種類的說明範例。
constitutes the root of a single well-formed XML example demonstrating the use of some XML element or attribute.
包含形式合法的單一XML範例的根結構，用以說明某些XML元素或屬性的使用方法。
contains the name (generic identifier) of an element.
包含一個元素名稱(通用識別符碼)。

attDef.desc: supplies the name of the scheme in which this name is defined.
提供定義該名稱的基模名稱。

valItem.gloss: this element is part of the TEI scheme.
此元素為TEI基模的一部份。
this element is part of the Docbook scheme.
此元素為 Docbook基模的一部份。
this element is part of an unknown scheme.
此元素所屬基模不明。

elementSpec.desc: contains an identifier or name for an object of some kind in a formal language
包含一個使用正式語言的某種物件的識別符碼或名稱。
contains text of a complete start- or end-tag, possibly including attribute specifications, but excluding the opening and closing markup delimiter characters.
包含具有完整開始標籤與結束標籤的文字，可能包括屬性說明，但不包含開頭及結尾標記定義符號。

attDef.desc: supplies the name of the scheme in which this name is defined.
提供定義該名稱的基模名稱。

valItem.gloss: this tag is part of the TEI scheme.
此標籤為TEI基模的一部份。
this element is part of the Docbook scheme.
此標籤為Dockbook基模的一部份。

elementSpec.desc: contains a single attribute value.
包含單一屬性值。
marks where a list of descriptions is to be inserted into the prose documentation.
標記一敘述列表插入散文文件的位置。
indicates that a description of the specified element or class should be included at this point within a document.
指出指定元素或元素集的描述應在此包括在文件中。

attDef.desc: supplies the identifier of the documentary element or class for which a description is to be obtained.
提供文件元素或元素集的識別符碼。
supplies attribute names for which descriptions should additionally be obtained.
提供其屬性描述應另外包含的屬性名稱。
attDef.valDesc: a whitespace-separated list of attribute names
屬性名稱列表，中間用空白鍵隔開。

elementSpec.desc: references a module which is to be incorporated into a schema.
參照一個被併入一模型的模組。

attDef.desc: the name of a TEI module
TEI模組名稱
refers to a non-TEI module by external location
用外部位置參照到一個非TEI模組

elementSpec.desc: documents the structure, content, and purpose of a single module, i.e. a named and externally visible group of declarations.
記錄單一模組的結構、內容、以及用途，例如：一個已命名且外部明確的宣告組。

attDef.desc: type of module to be generated
建立的模組類型
attDef.valDesc: A closed set of keywords yet to be defined
仍須被定義的封閉式關鍵字組

elementSpec.desc: generates a TEI-conformant schema and documentation for it.
建立一個符合TEI標準的模型以及該模型文件。

attDef.desc: specifies entry points to the schema, i.e. which elements are allowed to be used as the root of documents conforming to it.
指出模型的首要條件，例如哪些元素可作為符合該模型標準的文件中的根元素。
specifies the default namespace (if any) applicable to components of the schema.
指出適用於該模型元件的預設名稱空間(若有名稱空間)。
specifies a prefix which will be appended to all patterns relating to TEI elements. This allows for external schemas to be mixed in which have elements of the same names as the TEI.
指明一個附加在所有和TEI元素相關的模式中的前綴。這使得外部模型可以和TEI結合，這些外部模型具有和TEI元素名稱相同的元素。
Where names for element or attribute are available in more than one language, specifies which language to use when creating the objects in a schema.
若元素或屬性名稱所使用的語言有一種以上，說明建立文件模型時要使用那一種語言。
Where the descrition for an element, attribute, class or macro is available in more than one language, specifies which languages to use when creating documentation.
若元素、屬性、元素集或巨集指令描述所使用的語言有一種以上，說明建立文件時要使用那一種語言。

elementSpec.desc: contains any convenient grouping of specifications for use within the current module.
包含在現有模組中的細節使用說明群組。
indicates that the declarations contained by the specGrp referenced should be inserted at this point.
指出被參照的specGrp元素中的宣告應在此插入。

attDef.desc: points at the specification group which logically belongs here.
指向照理屬於此位置的說明群組。

elementSpec.desc: contains the intended expansion for the entity documented by an patternSpec element, enclosed by quotation marks.
包含對於記錄在元素patternSpec裡的實體所預期的擴展性，在引用符號中呈現。
documents the structure, content, and purpose of a single element type.
紀錄單一元素類型的結構、內容、以及用途。

attDef.desc: specifies the namespace to which this element belongs
指明該元素所屬的名稱空間。
specifies the optionality of an attribute or element.
指明屬性或元素的使用任意性。

valItem.gloss: required
必須使用
mandatory when applicable
合適的情況下必須使用
recommended
建議使用
recommended when applicable
合適的情況下建議使用
optional
隨意使用

elementSpec.desc: contains reference information for a TEI element class; that is a group of elements which appear together in content models, or which share some common attribute, or both.
包含一個TEI元素集的參照資訊；元素集是一群在內容模組中同時出現、或共用某些屬性、或兩者皆包括的元素。

attDef.desc: indicates whether this is a model class or an attribute class
指出這是結構元素集或是屬性元素集。

valItem.desc: members of this class appear in the same content models
該元素集的元素出現在相同的內容模組中
members of this class share common attributes
該元素集的元素有共用的屬性

attDef.desc: indicates which alternation and sequence instantiations of a model class should be created. By default, all variations are provided.
說明應該建立結構元素集的哪些替換及連續例證。在預設的情形下，會提供所有的變數。

valItem.desc: members of the class are alternatives
該元素集的元素是替換元素
members of the class are to be provided in sequence
該元素集的元素會連續提供
members of the class may be provided, in sequence, but are optional
該元素集的元素可連續提供，但非必須
members of the class may be provided one or more times, in sequence, but are optional.
該元素集的元素可一次或多次連續提供，但非必須
members of the class may be provided one or more times, in sequence
該元素集的元素可一次或多次連續提供

elementSpec.desc: documents the function and implementation of a pattern.
記錄模式的功能與實行。

attDef.desc: indicates which type of entity should be generated, when an ODD processor is generating a module using SGML syntax.
指出當一個ODD處理器使用SGML語法建立模組時，應建立哪種類型的實體。

valItem.gloss: parameter entity
參數實體
element parameter entity
元素參數實體
general entity
一般實體
datatype entity
數據類型實體

elementSpec.desc: contains any commentary or discussion about the usage of an element, attribute, class, or entity not otherwise documented within the containing element.
包含任何關於元素、屬性、元素集，或實體的使用的評論或討論，否則將沒有關於這些元素、屬性、元素集，或實體的紀錄。
supplies a list of significant references to places where this element is discussed, in the current document or elsewhere.
提供一個重要參照的列表，這些參照連結到詳述此元素的位置，在此文件裡或是其他地方。
contains a single example demonstrating the use of an element, together with optional paragraphs of commentary.
包含元素使用的單一範例，可任意配合註解段落。
specifies all the classes of which the documented element or class is a member or subclass.
標明所記錄的元素或元素集所屬或是附屬的所有元素集。
specifies class membership of the parent element or class.
標明父元素或元素集所屬的元素集。

attDef.desc: specifies the identifier for a class of which the documented element or class is a member or subclass
標別所記錄的元素或元素集所屬或是附屬的元素集的識別名稱，

elementSpec.desc: contains the text of a declaration for the schema documented.
包含所記錄的模型的宣告文字。

macroSpec.desc: A pattern to match elements from the chosen schema language
配合所選擇的模型語言中的元素的模式

elementSpec.desc: contains documentation for all the attributes associated with this element, as a series of attDef elements.
包含所有和此元素相關的屬性記錄，使用一連串的attDef元素

attDef.desc: specifies whether all the attributes in the list are available (org="group") or only one of them (org="choice")
標明是否列表中的全部屬性皆可使用(org="group")、或是僅可使用其中一個(org="choice")。

valItem.gloss: grouped
集合使用
alternated
替換使用

elementSpec.desc: contains the definition of a single attribute.
包含單一屬性的定義。

attDef.desc: specifies the optionality of an attribute or element.
說明屬性或元素的使用任意性。

valItem.gloss: required
必須使用
mandatory when applicable
合適的情況下必須使用
recommended
建議使用
recommended when applicable
合適的情況下建議使用
optional
隨意使用

attDef.desc: specifies the namespace to which this attribute belongs
指明該屬性所屬的名稱空間。

elementSpec.desc: points to the definition of an attribute or group of attributes.
連結到屬性或屬性群組的定義。

attDef.desc: the name of the pattern defining the attribute(s)
定義屬性的模式名稱

elementSpec.desc: specifies the declared value for an attribute, by referring to any datatype defined by the chosen schema language.
指明屬性的公開屬性值，參照到任何所選擇的模型語言所定義的資料類型。

attDef.desc: indicates the minimum number of times this datatype may occur in the specification of the attribute being defined
指出該資料型式在所定義的屬性說明中可能出現的最少次數 。
indicates the maximum number of times this datatype may occur in the specification of the attribute being defined
指出該資料型式在所定義的屬性說明中可能出現的最多次數。

elementSpec.desc: specifies the default declared value for an attribute.
標明屬性的預設宣告值。
specifies any semantic or syntactic constraint on the value that an attribute may take, additional to the information carried by the datatype element.
除了元素datatype所帶有的資訊之外，說明屬性可使用的屬性值在字義或語法上的限制。

attDef.desc: specifies the effect of this declaration on its parent module.
標明該宣告在其來源模組中的作用。

valItem.gloss: this declaration is added to the current definitions
該宣告添加在現有定義中
this declaration and all of its children are removed from the current setup
該宣告以及所有子宣告從現有的設定中被移除。
this declaration changes the declaration of the same name in the current definition
該宣告改變在現有定義中名稱相同的宣告。
this declaration replaces the declaration of the same name in the current definition
該宣告代替在現有定義中名稱相同的宣告

elementSpec.desc: contains a single value and gloss pair for an attribute.
包含一屬性的一個屬性值及註解對。
contains one or more valItem elements defining possible values for an attribute.
包含一個或多個元素valItem，以定義一個屬性可使用的屬性值。

attDef.desc: specifies the effect of this declaration on its parent module.
標明該宣告在其來源模組中的作用。

valItem.gloss: this declaration is added to the current definitions
該宣告添加在現有定義中
this declaration and all of its children are removed from the current setup
該宣告以及所有子宣告從現有的設定中被移除
this declaration changes the declaration of the same name in the current definition
該宣告改變在現有定義中名稱相同的宣告
this declaration replaces the declaration of the same name in the current definition
該宣告代替在現有定義中名稱相同的宣告

attDef.desc: specifies the extensibility of the list of attribute values specified.
標明該屬性值列表的延展性。

valItem.gloss: only the values specified are permitted.
僅容許標明的屬性值。
all the values specified should be supported, but other values are legal and software should have appropriate fallback processing for them.
所有標明的屬性值應該維持有效；但其他屬性值亦為合法，且所使用的軟體對於它們應該具有適當的後備處理程序。
the values specified are sample values only.
所標明的屬性值僅為樣本屬性值。

classSpec.desc: elements which can be referenced by means of a key attribute
可利用屬性key來參照的元素

attDef.desc: Supplies the identifier by which this element is referenced.
提供被參照的元素的識別符號。
The name of a module on which this object depends.
該元素所依賴的模組名稱。
Says whether the class should be treated as global, and so needs predefining in the core.
說明該元素集是否為全域元素集，並必須在核心中宣告。
Supplies the name of the module in which this object is to be defined.
提供定義該元素的模組名稱。
specifies the effect of this declaration on its parent module.
標明該宣告在其來源模組中的作用。

valItem.gloss: this declaration is added to the current definitions
該宣告添加在現有定義中
this declaration and all of its children are removed from the current setup
該宣告以及所有子宣告從現有的設定中被移除
this declaration changes the declaration of the same name in the current definition
該宣告改變在現有定義中名稱相同的宣告。
this declaration replaces the declaration of the same name in the current definition
該宣告代替在現有定義中名稱相同的宣告
